Package com.pandora.config.species

Class DIC

java.lang.Object
com.pandora.config.Variable
com.pandora.config.species.abstractions.Specie
com.pandora.config.species.abstractions.AqueousSpecie
com.pandora.config.species.DIC
All Implemented Interfaces:
Carbon, Dissolved, Inorganic, SpecieConfiguration, SpecieLogic, VariableConfiguration
@ConditionalOnProperty(name="dic.enabled", havingValue="true") @Configuration @Order(1) public class DIC extends AqueousSpecie implements Dissolved, Inorganic, Carbon
The DIC class represents Dissolved Inorganic Carbon (DIC) as a bean in the PANDORA model. It is configured based on properties specified in the "dic" namespace. The class implements the Dissolved, Inorganic, and Carbon interfaces, providing specific characteristics associated with dissolved inorganic carbon species.

The DIC bean includes properties such as name, unit of measurement, and molar mass, which are configured from the corresponding properties in the "dic" namespace. The class is conditionally loaded using the ConditionalOnProperty annotation with the "dic.enabled" property.

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Wim Joost van Hoek

  • Constructor Details

    • DIC

      public DIC()
      Default constructor for creating an instance of the DIC bean. It logs a message indicating that the DIC bean is being loaded.

    • getMolarMass

      public double getMolarMass()
      Retrieves the molar mass of the biogeochemical species. The molar mass represents the mass of one mole of the species and is a crucial parameter for various biogeochemical calculations.
      Specified by:
      getMolarMass in interface SpecieConfiguration
      Returns:
